ygData.subject: Re: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: Happened to look in the EQ directory and found a log file dbg.txt obviously a file to aid in debugging. in this file it contains a few lines that look like
ygData.messageBody:
Happened to look in the EQ directory and found a log file

dbg.txt
obviously a file to aid in debugging.
in this file it contains a few lines
that look like this

EQGAME SENDS OUT CHECKSUMS HERE

I don't know exactly what that does, but I would assume it is checking file
sizes.

I don't believe that the following would work for long for that reason.

> That way you crack the file replace the
> actual file right before logging on and wen their servers go to pull the
> info bingo they pull the cracked file.
